title: Premiere: Let’s Away – You & I
content:
Alongside Arbeia, Sunderland’s Let’s Away are another of the brightest sparks in what is a brightly burning North East music scene, slowly but surely honing their sound and pulling together their live shows. Playing to the frailties and imperfections of the human mind, new track You & I is a Scott Walker inspired, majestic ballad, and a clear development of their songwriting abilities; languid but deeply affecting. One can just as easily imagine it being played for the first dance of a wedding, as during a funeral march in an uber-cool indie flick.

You & I is taken from a double A single with the equally fantastic Suitably Loose, out 17 June, available for purchase via Bandcamp. Check out both tracks below.
